2nd_factor_required: Confidential data. Email authentication is required for this. If you click ok, you will receive an email with a link to this page.
access_denied: Access denied. Please check your information.
app_description: Online appointment booking is only possible if you are already registered in our system and we have your email address.
appointment_booked: Appointment on {day} at {time} has been booked
appointment_explanation: Please cancel in time if you cannot attend the appointment.
ask_for_mail: If you would like a confirmation of the appointment by email, click here
check_email_for_token: Email sent. Please check your inbox and click on the link in the email to continue.
error_sending_2nd_factor: Error sending authentication email. Please try again later.
expired: Your session is invalid or has expired. Please log in again.
internal_server_error: Oops: Internal server error. Please try again in a few hours.
no_slots_available: No free appointments available for this date
please_choose_option: You can either schedule a new appointment or view and cancel your existing appointments.
select_appointments_to_remove: Select the appointments you would like to cancel:
